select fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_like, f_image1 from (select fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_like, f_image1 from myjeju_food order by f_like desc) where rownum <= 3
select fid, f_name, f_tag, f_infor, f_infor2, f_addr, f_hp, f_like, f_image1, f_image2, f_image3, f_image4, f_image5 from myjeju_food where fid=#{fid}
